Sentencas: In single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells (SC-SOFC), anode and cathode are placed in a gas chamber where they are exposed to a fuel/air mixture.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similarly to conventional dual-chamber SOFC, the anode and the cathode are separated by an electrolyte.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, as in the SC-SOFC configuration the electrolyte does not play tightness role between compartments, this one can be a porous layer.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, it is necessary to have a diffusion barrier to prevent the transportation of hydrogen produced locally at the anode to the cathode that reduces fuel cell performances.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study aims to obtain directly a diffusion barrier through the surface densification of the electrolyte Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (CGO) by a laser treatment.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: KrF excimer laser and Yb fiber laser irradiations were used at different fluences and number of pulses to modify the density of the electrolyte coating.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructural characterizations confirmed the modifications on the surface of the electrolyte for appropriate experimental conditions showing either grain growth or densified but cracked surfaces.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Gas permeation and electrical conductivities of the modified electrolyte were evaluated.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally SC-SOFC performances were improved for the cells presenting grain growth at the electrolyte surface.
Titulo: Laser induced densification of cerium gadolinium oxide: Application to single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells
